document.masterDocTitle: The type specimens of bees (Hymenoptera, Apoidea) deposited in the Zoological Institute of the Russian Academy of Sciences, St. Petersburg. Contribution II. Family Halictidae, subfamilies Rophitinae, Nomiinae, and Nomioidinae

Nomioides ( Nomioides ) ornatus

(key to females), 127 (key to males), 150, figs 184, 226, 287–290, ♀ , ♂ .

subSubSection.paragraph: Published (original) locality: corresponds to data on the holotype label (see below).
